public class BingoGUI
extends edu.kzoo.grid.gui.GridAppFrame

Bingo Game:
A BingoGUI object represents the graphical user interface for a game of bingo.

April 21, 2009
Author:
Alyce Brady

Constructor Detail

BingoGUI

public BingoGUI(BingoCard card,
                BingoGame game,
                java.lang.String author,
                java.lang.String assistance,
                java.lang.String versionOrDate,
                java.lang.String helpFile)
Constructs a graphical user interface to display the given Bingo card.

Parameters:
card - the card to display
game - the game controller
author - the author(s) of the program
assistance - the names of anyone who provided assistance to the author(s)
versionOrDate - a number or date identifying the version of the program being executed
